LFADS.DatasetCollection¶

classLFADS.DatasetCollection(path[, name=leaf of path])[source]¶

Bases: handle, matlab.mixin.CustomDisplay

A collection of multiple Datasets to be processed by LFADS as a cohesive group, either using stitching to incorporate multiple datasets simultaneously, or individually to multiple independent LFADS fits.

Properties

Information about this DatasetCollection's name and location

name = ''[source]¶

Name of the dataset collection, will be used to construct folder paths on disk

comment = ''[source]¶

Textual comment for convenience

path = ''[source]¶

path to this dataset collection’s root location on disk, if applicable

Read-only Properties

Read-onlydatasets = None[source]¶

Array of LFADS.Dataset instances

Dependent Properties

DependentnDatasets = None[source]¶

Number of datasets in this collection

Methods

[ds] = DatasetCollection(path[, name=leaf of path])[source]¶

Parameters¶

path
: string
Path to root of dataset collection. Can be blank if you’ve overriden loadData and aren’t loading datasets from disk directly as .mat files
name
: string
Dataset collection name. Defaults to the leaf folder in path
addDataset(dataset)[source]¶

Adds a dataset to the collection. Note that LFADS.Dataset instances are added to their dataset collection upon construction, so calling this method is likely unnecessary for the end user.

Parameters¶

dataset
: LFADS.Dataset
Dataset to add to the collection.
clearDatasets()[source]¶

Flush all datasets from this collection

loadInfo()[source]¶

Call loadInfo on each dataset in this collection

filterDatasets()[source]¶

Retain a selected subsets of datasets, effectively doing datasets = datasets(mask)

Parameters¶

mask
: logical or indices
Selection applied to .datasets
[datasets] = matchDatasetsByName()[source]¶

Returns the subset of datasets in this collection matching a name in names.

Parameters¶

names
: string or cellstr
Name or names of datasets to find
[t] = getDatasetInfoTable()[source]¶

Build a table of datasets and associated metadata within this dataset. This will call loadInfo and load info for datasets whose metadata has not yet been loaded.
